Submodules¶

Scraping.items module¶

Items are objects for spiders to save data into.

class Scraping.items.Artist(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: scrapy.item.Item

The artiest item stores artist information from the show spider’s parse artist method

fields = {'name': {}}¶
class Scraping.items.Event(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: scrapy.item.Item

The event item stores show information from the show spider

fields = {'ages': {}, 'artist': {}, 'date': {}, 'name': {}, 'time': {}, 'url': {}, 'venue': {}}¶
class Scraping.items.Venue(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: scrapy.item.Item

The venue item stores venue information from the show spider’s parse venue methods

fields = {'city': {}, 'name': {}, 'state': {}}¶

Scraping.pipelines module¶

The pipeline file. Pipelines take the items generated by the spiders and process them, in this case by adding infomation to the database.

class Scraping.pipelines.ShowPipeline¶

Bases: object

The show pipeline ensures that the artist and venue exist in the database, creates them if they are not, and converts the event item into the show model.

process_item(item, spider)¶

Scraping.settings module¶

This is the scraping settings file. It contains the settings that Scrapy uses.
